name: Leather Jacket
description: A simple leather jacket that offers minimal protection but a classic look. Better than nothing against the dangers of the world.

name: Rags
description: Layers of worn and dirty fabric. Offer almost no protection, but keep out the worst of the cold.

name: Kevlar Vest
description: A tactical vest with Kevlar inserts. Offers excellent protection against bullets and piercing attacks.

name: Combat Helmet
description: A standard military helmet. Offers good head protection from impacts and shrapnel.

name: Tattered Pants
description: Worn pants full of patches. Offer little protection, but are better than nothing.

name: Reinforced Jeans
description: Heavy denim jeans with synthetic fiber reinforcements. Durable and practical for travel.

name: Leather Leggings
description: Leg guards made of thick leather, carefully stitched. Offer good defense against physical attacks.

name: Tactical Leg Armor
description: Military-type leg guards with reinforced plates. High-quality tactical gear.
